Articles.Content:
hello-world!

I'm proud to present you my first part successfully integrated in KSP:

...I know its ugly (it's a monkey demo part from blender) i just made the texture and stole a config file from a fueltank!

after some hours to find and understand the good tutoriels it's great to see this side of a video game, before this i never touched a texture and other stuff..(u didnt doubt... did u vomit?)

congrate to squad for this aspect (it can be as fun as playing ), developpers of tutorials and part-tool,...

i'm so happy to see this in space!!!!

... What the hell is that?

It's the default Blender monkey model. It looks like OP just ported it into unity.

I remember the first time I managed to get my first model to work in Half-Life. It was just an animated box, but I was so happy. So I know how you feel. Why don't you visit General Add-on Affairs, and find a request that you can do? You can search for all threads with the [Request] tag.

I'm preparing the next (real) project!

see u soon!!

thanks again for the tutorials guys
Ah. Hl modding! That brings back memoirous tinkering wit that sdk and making own player models. Op welcome to the gloroius possiblities of modding in ksp
Congrats! But remember that once you start down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny
...can you release this? I kind of want to use as the figurehead for a ship http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Figurehead_(object) :P

Congrats! I've been working on some parts myself, and although I did manage to create a not-ugly model for an SRB once, I never got around to texturing it and getting it into the game. Keep up, and you might end up making the next big hit!

1 fan, yeeah!

unfortunatelly i erased my 1st work, but i rebuilt it for u (it's amazing u want this ugly part...is it a joke?)

there is also a free picture if u want to paint it yourself!

http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=00458028108956190489

Licence:

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Edited April 9, 2015 by Skalou

OOOH! A Tintin mod! (Objective: Moon)

Classy, sir.

thank you Starship. Tintin? who is? it's just a red rocket with 3 legs!

I don't know if i will release the mun rocket, i'm a bit scared about copyright on the tintin comic, because they sell a lot of derivated products like star_wars do.

someone had asking the same question yet?

but it permits me to discover how the mains things works anyway: blender, unity, KSP modules,...

Now i want to design my own style and learn the new modules, aero system.

maybe one day codding a bit for ksp but it seems hard when you don't have knowlege in basic codding.
Did you use blender by any chance?

thank you Starship. Tintin? who is? it's just a red rocket with 3 legs!

I don't know if i will release the mun rocket, i'm a bit scared about copyright on the tintin comic, because they sell a lot of derivated products like star_wars do.

someone had asking the same question yet?

but it permits me to discover how the mains things works anyway: blender, unity, KSP modules,...

Now i want to design my own style and learn the new modules, aero system.

maybe one day codding a bit for ksp but it seems hard when you don't have knowlege in basic codding.

Someone else on the forum is already doing this...
